content: the court in rome has made a final ruling in a case involving the division of community property between the heirs of two individuals the court has assigned specific real estate properties to each heir based on their respective hereditary shares the court has also ordered the cancellation of mortgages on certain properties and the registration of the division of the properties in the appropriate real estate registers the court has determined the value of each property and the overall value of the divided properties additionally the court has addressed issues related to irregularities in the properties and the establishment of an easement for passage one heir is required to make a cash adjustment payment to the other heir and a mortgage is registered as security for the payment existing mortgages on certain properties have been ordered to be cancelled the court has divided the litigation costs between the parties and determined that the expenses of the courtappointed expert witness will be shared equally the ruling was made on november 10 2018 and filed in the clerks office on december 10 2018
